page.title: 15FASHIONS TODAY, HARROW.
page.content: The colours for{clothes}this year are mainly white, pink and blue. Our fashions keep changing. Plastic {bangles}and{earrings}are the trend this year. You can buy earrings that are gold or silver, plastic or metal. Some earrings are dangly, others are just stud-like. Lots of earrings are in pastel colours. Plastic{bags}are the rage now; lots of people have them. Plastic{shoes}were fashionable last year and they still are. { Hairstyles}are really trendy in 1985. You can have{perms}and{skinheads}which is where the hair is nearly all shaved off. You can colour your hair any colour you want to. You can also make your hair stand on end by back combing. We wear{trainers}on our feet for doing sports or running around. We wear{track suits}for jogging or for doing sports on a cold day.
